oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Determination of the resonant frequency of microstrip antennas
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RAY, KP
KUMAR, G
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: compact shorted variations
patch antenna
accurate formula
microstrip antennas
effective dielectric constant
edge extension
dispersion effect
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A generalized method is proposed to determine the effective dielectric constant and edge extension for predicting the resonant frequency of various microstrip antennas (MSAs) by equating their area with that of the equivalent rectangular microstrip antenna (RMSA). The theoretical frequency obtained using the present method is in very good agreement with the reported / measured frequencies. (C) 1999 , Inc.
